CustomField.description: Calculated qADAM score between 10 and 50, with 10 being most symptomatic and 50 being least symptomatic
CustomField.formula: Q1_Libido_Rating__c + Q2_Energy_Rating__c + Q3_Strength_Endurance_Rating__c + Q4_Life_Enjoyment_Rating__c + Q5_Happiness_Rating__c + Q6_Erection_Strength_Rating__c + Q7_Work_Performance_Rating__c + Q8_Falling_Asleep_Rating__c + Q9_Sports_Ability_Rating__c + Q10_Height_Lost_Rating__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated qADAM score between 10 and 50, with 10 being most symptomatic and 50 being least symptomatic
CustomField.label: qADAM Score
